stories.storyText:
[Code Name] Podenco
[Gender] Female
[Combat Experience] None
[Place of Birth] Bolívar
[Date of Birth] Mar 25
[Race] Perro
[Height] 145cm
[Infection Status] 
Medical tests have confirmed that no infection is present.

[Physical Strength] Normal
[Mobility] Standard
[Physical Resilience] Normal
[Tactical Acumen] Normal
[Combat Skill] Normal
[Originium Arts Assimilation] Normal

Podenco is an operator who applied to join Rhodes Island through a normal process, and is responsible for taking care of the greenhouse and cultivating flowers in Perfumer's Convalescent Garden. Can also be deployed as a combat operator and is capable of utilizing her understanding of plants to heal teammates or disrupt enemies.

Imaging tests reveal clear, normal outlines of internal organs, and no abnormal shadows have been detected. Originium granules have not been detected in the circulatory system and there is no sign of infection. At this time, this operator is believed to be uninfected. 

[Cell-Originium Assimilation] 0%
Operator Podenco has no signs of Originium infections. 

[Blood Originium-Crystal Density] 0.13u/L
Operator Podenco has very little contact with Originium. 

'That scent, it's so good... So refreshing... Ah, ah... Achoo!' —A medic operator with a pollen allergy

Podenco was born into a small settlement on the steppes near the border of Bolívar. While this remote settlement was able to escape the flames of war due to its distance from the center of Bolívar, this isolation also created its own problems. To ensure their survival, the people of this settlement delved into their natural talents at evading Catastrophes and cultivating crops. Podenco has been interested in a variety of plants since a young age, likes to make dried flowers, and also tended a small nursery back home. As she grew up, she became involved in the community's farming efforts, gaining rich experience in botanical cultivation for plants both edible and ornamental. When asked which type of plants she prefers, Podenco will quietly tell you that she likes flowers more, but when food and clothing become a scarcity, she will silently stash away her personal preferences deep into her heart.

Not everyone who lives in these remote regions aspires to lead a bustling life in a distant land, but Podenco was one such person who did. The people of her home had little contact with the outside world, but the interactions they did have gradually gave Podenco a rosy impression of the outside world, particularly towards flowers. She had seen all kinds of flora in the world depicted through books and photos, but someone who never left Bolívar would never be able to see these flowers in their entire life. Within her stirred a great anticipation to see the outside world.

After arriving at Rhodes Island, her becoming Perfumer's coworker and apprentice was actually by chance. The young Podenco, like a fledgling leaving the nest, was completely spellbound by the magnificence of the city after arriving at the closest nomadic city from her hometown. She couldn't wait to find some place filled with fragrance and beauty, and soon after, she bumped into Perfumer in the middle of the street. Perfumer immediately noticed Podenco's fondness for flowers, and her own Garden happened to be short of the personnel needed to make her aromatherapy raw materials. And just like that, Podenco ran into someone by mistake, and landed herself the first job of her life. 
Compared to Perfumer, Podenco still is lacking in many ways. Her sense of smell isn't as sensitive as Perfumer's, nor does she have any knowledge of auxiliary professions, but she is quickly approaching Perfumer's skill with the momentum she has. From a single flower, to a garden, and now to an entire greenhouse, Podenco has the skill to independently manage the Convalescent Garden. In addition, she also began to use the flowers she collected to create a wide variety of reagents, constantly adapting to meet the demands of the various medics in the medical facility. In time, she may well become the world's undisputed master of horticulture. 
And it all stems from her love for flowers. 
A lifelong love.

'Podenco's Greenhouse - Production Commission Details' 
We can make floral tea, which is best enjoyed in the greenhouse. 
With a flower purse, you can always carry a soothing fragrance with you. 
Experience better rest with a flower pillow (please allow extra time for production). 
Come enjoy my flower biscuits, but please supply all the ingredients other than the flowers. 
Please discuss with me if you would like to request any other items, and I will see if there is a possibility of making it. 
There are many combinations of the above items to choose from. Please contact me for further details.

skins.description:
An outfit commonly worn by Operators.
While not as practical as a uniform, it's what they find most comfortable.

An outfit that has been improved after the Operator's Promotion.
Custom-made to suit each Operator's experiences and needs, these outfits are designed to provide them maximum flexibility on any battlefield. Furthermore, this is all done without compromising the comfort that they've come to expect.
EPOQUE Collection New Arrivals/Wake Up From a Nap. Home leisure style, selected for Podenco by Lena. Similar colors to Podenco's original clothing, but with a complete change of style.

skills.desc: ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, now <@ba.vup>heals</> allied units instead of attacking

Throws a vial that, upon shattering, releases a cloud of spores for <@ba.vup>{projectile_delay_time}</> seconds
All enemies within the spore cloud are <$ba.sluggish>Slowed</> and silenced, and receive <@ba.vup>{atk_scale:0%}</> Arts damage every second

modules.desc:
Operator Podenco has demonstrated a remarkable aptitude for impeding the enemy.
The Field Operations Department has thus passed the following resolution:
This operator shall be appointed a Supporter Operator during field operations to exercise Decel Binder responsibilities.
In witness whereof,
This badge is hereby conferred upon the above named.

To the operator temporarily standing in for me:
Hello.

My name is Podenco. My health hasn't been too good lately. The doctors say it's because of overwork and so on, so I have to recuperate, and I'm not allowed to go and look after the plants. That's why I need you to take over some of the Convalescent Garden's work. I'll write what you need to do underneath, and if you're not sure about anything, you can ask Miss Lena to teach you. I'll recover as soon as I can, so I won't keep you for too long.
Before I introduce the work to you, please take a look to the right of this letter. There's a pouch with floral teabags, and some tasty little snacks. They're all for you, to say thank you. Go on and have them while you read below.

Your daily work will involve the following:
1. Temperature logging and warning. Each greenhouse entrance has a terminal to control the thermoregulatory equipment. You just need to check each day if the figures are normal or not, that's all. If the equipment's giving a warning, then report it to Miss Lena as soon as possible, and she'll help you solve the problem.
2. Operating the lighting. The Garden's lighting systems are all unified under PRTS control, so you don't actually need to worry too much, but just in case it's not working properly, you'll need to operate them manually, and adjust them into the correct positions. I've drawn detailed directions on another sheet, so make sure you look over that carefully.
3. Plant irrigation. You can leave most of the plants alone, and the greenhouse will sprinkle them at the same times each day. The schedule should be stuck to the door, so don't go inside when that's happening. There's some other flowers too, the ones in my studio, and I'm really sorry, but all I can do is ask you to take care of them for the time being. I've labelled how much water and nutritional fluid every plant needs on their pots, so keep a close eye on the markings on the spray bottle, and don't give them too much.
......
That's all I wanted to tell you. Once again, thank you for finding the time in your busy schedule to help me. If you like the presents I left you, then I promise I'll make more for you once I'm back in shape.


—Podenco

voice_lines.voiceText: Ehehe~ Oh, Doctor, is your day going well?
This is a floral tea that I made myself! Doctor, come try a cup, I promise you'll feel cozy all day!
The sunlight in the greenhouse is so comfortable. Even though I'm an operator, it sometimes makes me want to slack.
Use the fruits of your labor to make everyone forget about their sorrows and worries. That's probably the tenet of all gardeners, don't you think~?
I much rather prefer growing things to destroying them. But as long as I think about how I can help everyone, I can muster up my courage.
These bottles? Inside are all the pollen and seeds that I've been collecting. I usually wear a gas mask and gloves before handling them, or I might get poisoned.
Umm, everyone seems to be a bit weary these days. But, I'm sure they'll cheer right back up when they see the flowers I've planted!

Doctor, Doctor! Are you coming to the greenhouse today? It seems like everyone's been really busy the last few days... If nobody comes by the greenhouse, the blooming season's going to pass right by. Wouldn't that be a darn shame?
Tending to the greenhouse is really hard. But, as long as I can make others smile with the flowers I grow, all my hard work will be worth it!
Doctor? Oh, you're asleep... I hope the fragrance of these petals can drift over to your dreams.
Doctor, this is Podenco, here to say hi! If you have time, I'd love if you could come by the greenhouse!
Aw, I thought this was a video about gardening techniques.
Artist? N-n-no, I'm just a normal gardener.
Look, Doctor! The new varieties I've been tending to for so long have finally started to bloom! Aren't they so pretty?
Hm? Am I coming along as well?
Ah... I only have experience in tending a greenhouse. Is there anything I can do?
I see the enemy! Everyone, let's go!
Everyone, make sure to take care of yourselves!
Hmm?
Where are we going?
Got it.
I'll do as you say.
The pollen is allergenic~
Ah, I'll take care of them.
I've seen weeds like these before.
Let me protect everyone!
Phew, is it safe already? Good job, everyone!
Achieving a flawless victory is like cultivating a beautiful flower. Both require a lot of hard work.
Doctor, everyone is awaiting your next orders.
Ah... I never thought things could become like this...
Shall we plant some flowers over here?
Oh, Doctor?
Doctor! Would you like to decorate your office with some flowers?
Arknights.

Back home, most flowers would already have withered by now. But just thinking about how spring will be here soon... fills my heart with hope. Doctor, let's find the first flower that blooms in the greenhouse together!
Hello, Doctor!

Doctor, happy birthday! Please, try this floral tea! I made it the way Miss Lena taught me, and if you really savor it, you can taste a hint of cake flavor! Eh? You can't? Let me try... Oh... Sorry, Doctor. I... I think I forgot the honey…

I've been all over with Rhodes Island. Does that mean I've spread flowery fragrance to just as many places? Hehe... I may still have lots of room for improvement, compared to Miss Lena, but I'll do my best to make Rhodes Island an even warmer place!

building_skills.desc: When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores <@cc.vup>+0.55</> Morale per hour to another Operator assigned to that Dormitory whose Morale is not full (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place)

When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores <@cc.vup>+0.65</> Morale per hour to another Operator assigned to that Dormitory whose Morale is not full (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place)
When this Operator is assigned to a Dormitory, restores <@cc.vup>+0.15</> Morale per hour to all Operators assigned to that Dormitory (Only the strongest effect of this type takes place)
